OUTLINE : This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord high-risk ( prior allogeneic bone marrow transplantation prior chemotherapy relapse acute leukemia ) v low-risk prior prophylactic antifungal therapy chemotherapy ( yes v ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive caspofungin acetate IV 1 hour follow placebo IV 2 hour . - Arm II : Patients receive placebo IV 1 hour follow amphotericin B liposomal IV 2 hour . Treatment repeat daily 28 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow 7 14 day study drug discontinuation . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 1060 patient ( 530 per arm ) accrue study .
